Glossary
========

.. glossary::

    IScorE
      `IScorE <https://iscore.iseage.org>`_ is the scoring system built and used by `ISEAGE <https://www.iseage.org>`_
      during their :term:`CDCs<CDC>`.

    CDC
      `Cyber Defense Competition <https://cdc.iseage.org>`_.

    Flag
      A file on the teams' system representing sensitive data. Red team's goal is to place red flags, and to read blue
      flags placed on the system by the Blue Teams.

    Red Team
      The attacking team.

    Blue Teams
      The defending teams.
